An/iOS 「Nintendo Switch Online」app
App Store下載，可scan設計QR code，可以打字傾計

實用網站
排隊網，菜價，外島，自製QR Code/主題曲，計種花，物品大全
菜價
https://turnipprophet.io/index.html
排隊網，唔駛成個post都係code
https://turnip.exchange/
種花計數機
https://aeonsake.gitlab.io/acnh-flower-breeder/
物品大全
https://nookplaza.net/
外島攻略
https://wuffs.org/acnh/mysterytour.html
生成設計QR code，可匯入任意圖片
https://acpatterns.com/editor
分割圖片，搭上面用
https://pinetools.com/split-image
島歌
https://tunes.nooknet.net/
設計島
https://planimalcrossing.com/nh/start/

實用攻略
真假藝術品 (Google Doc) https://shorturl.at/dtHU7
英文版全攻略 (Google Doc) http://shorturl.at/ntuW1

外國整理種花擺位攻略 (Google Doc) https://shorturl.at/gqtA7

7月30日早上9點 夏日更新Part 2 (ver 1.4.0)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=InDJvcWtTCw

更新內容

1. 花火大會 可放自製煙花






2. 神婆夢遊 上載自己個島俾人參觀 [需Switch Online]



3. 新items "牛郎織女の日" / "花火大會"



4. 壞機Save Data回復功能(sort of..) [需Switch Online]
-壞機經任天堂維修後先可復原save backup
-Save data轉移至第二部機嘅功能預計今年內推出

Next Week, Animal Crossing Players Can Donate Their Spoiled Turnips To A Good Cause

Hellmann’s Island will be open to visitors from 3:00 p.m. EST on Monday, August 17, to 12.15 a.m. EST on Saturday, August 22.
To access the island, gamers will direct message Hellmann’s Canada on Twitter @HellmannsCanada to receive their personal dodo code which will be shared on a first-come, first-served basis.
Selected visitors will be provided with a 15-minute timeslot to drop off their spoiled turnips. For each spoiled turnip dropped off, Hellmann’s will donate a meal to Second Harvest until the 25,000 meal target is achieved.
